title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
Introducing the ultimate travel companion for your international adventures - the [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR! This versatile 4-in-1 outlet adaptor is perfect for globetrotters from the USA visiting Italy for the first time or returning to explore more of its breathtaking landscapes and historical landmarks.

Crafted with convenience in mind, this compact and ultra-light adapter features two American outlets and two USB ports, making it easy to charge up to four devices simultaneously. Compatible with both 2-prong and 3-prong flat pin plugs from standard N American devices, this adaptor supports a maximum capacity of 2500 watts (250 volts, 10 amperes) and dual USB charging up to 2.4 amperes.

Not only is this adapter suitable for charging your cell phone, tablet, and power bank, but it also accommodates other electric products. Its grounded 3-prong plug ensures the safety of your devices while you're plugged in.

The VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter is not just for Italy - it's also compatible with other countries like Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City. With dimensions of just 1.8*2.6*2.3 inches, it's the perfect size to fit in your carry-on or backpack.

Backed by a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service, this adapter is CE and FCC certified, ensuring top-notch quality. Please note that this is not a converter, and your devices must support 100V-250V dual voltage for low-power electronics.

Feel secure and connected on your travels with the VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter - your reliable travel partner!
